question: You are studying for a qualification, and you would like some time off work to complete it.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:●	Ask for some time off to complete a qualification.●	Suggest what you will do later at work if you have time off.●	Say how the qualification helps your job or company
text: I am writing this letter to apply for ten days' leave in July month due to my final semester  examination at my college.

Firstly, I am currently doing my final year  master's degree in information technology at collins university .The university announces  the final semester exam dates from 15th to 25 th July.Moreover,I have to physically appear to participate in this exam to qualify for the master's degree.I am planning to apply for personal leave to complete my exam.

Furthermore,I have completed all my current work activities and provided the proper handover to a team leader  who can continue to work on the task.In addition,I have discussed with the product owner and provided a draft plan to complete my work on a weekend basis.It will significantly assist to complete the work without missing deadlines.

As part of this course completion,I will be awarded  a master's in network technology which will be an added advantage to  this job and my profile.The company could use my profile as a certified person to attract  client service.
I look forward to an affirmative response.Thank you.
